title: Introduction to Algebra
description: This lesson introduces the fundamental concepts of algebra, including variables, expressions, and simple equations. Ideal for beginners in secondary education.

title: Understanding Fractions
description: Learn how to interpret and perform operations with fractions, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

title: Basics of Geometry
description: Explore geometric shapes, lines, angles, and their properties. This lesson lays the foundation for future geometry topics.

title: Solving Linear Equations
description: Dive deeper into algebra by learning how to solve single-variable linear equations step-by-step.

title: Introduction to Data Handling
description: Understand how to collect, organize, and represent data using charts, tables, and graphs.

title: Arithmetic Word Problems
description: Apply arithmetic operations to solve real-world problems, focusing on logic, strategy, and units.

title: Ratio and Proportion
description: Learn how ratios and proportions are used in daily life and how to solve problems using cross multiplication.

title: Introduction to Graphs
description: Get introduced to plotting data on coordinate planes, understanding line graphs, and interpreting plotted data.

title: Algebraic Expressions
description: Learn how to construct and simplify algebraic expressions, and explore their real-life applications.

title: End of Unit Review: Algebra & Arithmetic
description: This lesson reviews key concepts from the unit, including algebra basics, equations, and arithmetic operations, with practice problems and solutions.

title: The Number Line and Integers
description: Explore the number line, positive and negative integers, and how to perform operations using the number line.

title: Decimal Numbers Explained
description: Understand decimal numbers, place value, and how to perform arithmetic operations involving decimals.

title: Order of Operations (PEMDAS)
description: Master the correct sequence of operations using PEMDAS to solve complex expressions accurately.

title: Percentages in Daily Life
description: Learn how percentages are used in discounts, taxes, and financial literacy with real-world examples.

title: Basic Probability Concepts
description: An introduction to probability, covering simple events, outcomes, and how to calculate basic probabilities.

title: Introduction to Area and Perimeter
description: Learn how to calculate the area and perimeter of rectangles and squares using formulas and examples.

title: Time and Measurement
description: Understand how to read time, convert between units, and measure objects using standard units.

title: Angles and Their Types
description: Identify and classify different types of angles (acute, right, obtuse), and learn how to measure them.

title: Constructing Triangles
description: Learn the properties of different types of triangles and how to draw them with accuracy.

title: Symmetry and Patterns
description: Explore the concept of symmetry, reflective patterns, and how they appear in art and nature.
